titleStmt.title: The French King's declaration of war by sea and land against the Spaniards revoking the passports, safeguards, and safe conducts, and making prohibition against having any commerce, and enjoyning his subjects to fall upon the Spaniards.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)

notesStmt.note: English and French texts in two columns.
Imprint from colophon; place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
